1253112121.content:
Kurenai really enjoyed her usual morning tea time. The sun bathing her skin, the warm feeling of the sweet liquid going down her throat, and last but not least, a folding chair that let her rest after her strenuous exercises. Yep, this was surely paradise on earth. The only problem was that she had to go on a mission before she could end her leisure time. “Go to a nearby village, try to find a suspicious blue haired woman that may be a spy.” those were the orders the Hokage gave her, and after sighing knowing that it was going to be a long mission, she stood up and prepared for it.

She took some kunais, shurikens, her headband and stopped when she realized that even if she had prepared a red shirt and black shorts for the mission, she had forgotten that she had taken most of her underwear to the laundry. “Well I still have this.” thought Kurenai holding with both of her hands her big white granny panties “Not the sexiest, but at least I will be wearing something.”. Ready and willing she walked outside her home and began her journey passing Konoha´s entrance and entering the forest. She tried to keep a quick pace, she could not know if the spy had went out of the village yet and each day that passed it was another day that the spy could use to hide herself or even flee.

As she had expected she arrived at the village in less than three hours. Instead of using the main way that went through the bunch of small wooden houses she decided that going through the back door would be much easier for her infiltration. She used the forest as cover and in no time she found a small path surrounded by large amounts of tall grass and other plants, she could use it without anyone noticing her. Feeling a little to excited she run through it, and bumped into another person that was going through the grass.

"Ugh!" the jounin fell on the floor, her head spinning. “Damn I should have been prepared for this kind of things!”, she looked at the person just some mere feet away from her and after standing up she proceeded to try and help her. "Sorry I wasn't looking...."

She stopped when she noticed that the woman that was now touching her head and trying to stand by herself had blue her and matched the description she had received. The same happened to Konan (the blue haired girl) who quickly found out that the clumsy person she had bumped with was in fact a ninja from Konoha, that might have come here searching for her. Konan was quicker than the jounin and kicked Kurenai in the gut sending her some feet away, trying to keep her distance while she prepared her paper jutsus.

Kurenai was quick in her recovery and jumped towards the spy kunai in her right hand while her left began to create an illusion to trap Konan. Her chakara fueled the jutsu and with one hand sign she sent the illusion to the blue haired spy. “Now she must think she is being surrounded by this plants, I must hurry before it wears off!” she jumped in the air and kicked the spy in her face...

..or would have if it hadn't transformed into paper figurines of birds that flew away leaving an astonished Kurenai trying to figure out what was happening. “She must be a ninja but if she was using a genjutsu I would have noticed the illusion, this must be something else” She looked around with her kunai ready to strike.

"Looking for someone?"Kurenai turned quickly and slashed where she tought she had heard the voice, but finding nothing but papers "Oh that wasn't very pleasant..." she turned again to find the spy smiling at her "I would like you to put that sharp thing down before you hurt someone."

"Like I would let you...EY!" Kurenai´s arms and legs were now surrounded by some rough strong paper that stopped her from moving, she tried as hard as she could but the material wasn´t breaking! "How the hell?!"

"Oh, this is my reinforced paper" said Konan taking the Kunai from Kurenai´s hand and throwing it away. "Nearly unbreakable, perfect for trapping enemy ninjas who get far too close for my comfort. Now tell me, who sent you and how did you know I was here?"

"I wont tell you a thing..." growled Kurenai, she couldn´t, there was no way that she, an experienced jounin, would tell anything to some spy that had trapped her just by dumb luck (she would never admit that it was partly her fault).

"*sigh* I don't want to have to hurt this pretty face of yours" said Konan caressing the jounin´s cheeks. "But there are other ways of making someone talk, and I know that they train you to resist normal torture, so I think we will have to try something a little more...unconventional."

She stopped touching Kurenai´s face and began walking in circles around her prisoner, trying to find something...and she quickly found it. She couldn´t help but smile as she realized what could she do with her new victim. She hadn't done this in a long time, in fact normally she was the one suffering because of it, but now...now she could have some fun and at the same time obtain information about Konoha. Two birds, one stone.

"Hey what are you doing!?" shouted Kurenai feeling her shirt being raised up to the middle of her back. She continued trying to think of something but without her being able to use her hands she could not use any justus, so, for now her best option was to squirm and yell. "Release me or you will beg...!!'

"Oh shut your mouth" said Konan amused. You sound like those girls I went with in the academy. So confident in their skills, so arrogant, trying to show everybody that they were the best and trying to humiliate the others like me, who wanted just a normal time. And you know what they did to me that I had always wanted to do to them?-Konan's hands grabbed the white showing waistband of Kurenai´s panties while she was speaking "A little thing called a...WEDGIE!!!"

Konan pulled upwards with both hands making sure that the material was fully stretched, surprisingly reaching the other kunoichi's neck in just one pull. The blue haired girl laughed as she found what Kurenai was wearing. "Granny panties, seriously? Wow you are asking for a wedgie wearing this!"

'EEEKKK!!!" Kurenai was having a hard time being tough now that her underwear was attacking her ass violently, some of the stretchy material even rising from the front of her shorts and beginning to climb towards her breasts/ "OW STO-AUGH!!

"Hahaha, wow you should see your face right now, this is hilarious!" Konan laughed as she continued bouncing the wide eyed leaf kunoichi's panties. "Bouncy bouncy!"

"Ouch, ouch, ouch!" the wedgied ninja felt how her paper bindings had grown a little longer to let their mistress bounce her some more and also getting her airborne, with her legs no longer touching the grass and the upper part of her body (from waist to head) now bent with her hands at the same level as her feet. "Owww...please no more..."

"Come on don't be such a little girl and take it like a woman!" said Konan looking down at the humiliated kunoichi. "I got like these when I was younger and I used to last a bit more than you do! Well, but at least I didn't wear this kind of underwear hahaha!
